channel.title: math.KT updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: math.KT updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: Higher K-theory of forms II. From exact categories to chain complexes
item.description: arXiv:2411.08746v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: We prove basic statements about the Hermitian K-theory of exact form categories with weak equivalences. Notably, we extend a quadratic functor with values in abelian groups from an exact category to its category of bounded chain complexes in a way that does not change Grothendieck-Witt spaces. This is used in joint work with Marlowe for the comparison of the classical 1-categorical version of the Hermitian K-theory of exact categories with the infinity-categorical version of Calmes-Dotto-Harpaz-Hebestreit-Land-Moi-Nardin-Nikolaus-Steimle.
item.dc:creator: Marco Schlichting

item.title: Lifting to truncated Brown-Peterson spectra and Hodge-de Rham degeneration in characteristic $p>0$
item.description: arXiv:2303.00739v2 Announce Type: replace-cross Abstract: The goal of this note is to prove that Hodge-de Rham degeneration holds for smooth and proper $\mathbf{F}_p$-schemes $X$ with $\dim(X)<p^n$ as soon as its category of quasicoherent sheaves admits a lift to the truncated Brown-Peterson spectrum $\mathrm{BP}\langle n-1\rangle$, and the Hochschild-Kostant-Rosenberg spectral sequence for $X$ degenerates at the $E_2$-page. This is obtained from a noncommutative version, whose proof is essentially the same as Mathew's argument in arXiv:1710.09045.
item.dc:creator: Sanath K. Devalapurkar
